physicalDescription.extent: 1 item (photograph), 10 x 8 inches, black and white
physicalDescription.note: On back of photograph: ''#1064 Kate, Bela and Eugene Fried, Bertha, Mary, Sally Fried''. On envelope: ''#1064 Fried's Framing and Gift Shop 1900-40s''.

mods.abstract: Members of the Fried family stand in front of the Fried's Picture Frame Factory in Denver, Colorado. Kate, Bela and Eugene Fried are standing behind an iron fence while Bela and Kate's daughters, Bertha, Mary and Sally are in front of the fence. A large sign reads, ''Fried's Picture Frame Factory, Frames Made to Order, 4 cents a foot and up, Come In and See Our Stock''.
mods.note: Appears in ''Images of America: Jewish Denver 1859-1940,'' by Dr. Jeanne Abrams, page 41.
Donated by Bobbi Furer, daughter of Sally Fried.

titleInfo.title: Beck Archives Photograph Collection, Families and Groups
